messages.subject: Question about stop motion movie making
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, My son has been making claymation type movies using an old 8mm camera and Pinnacle studio software.  Our camera has finally died. (It lasted longer
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

My son has been making "claymation" type movies using an old 8mm camera and Pinnacle studio software. Our camera has finally died. (It lasted longer than I expected.) If anyone has any camera/movie experience and would be willing to dialog off-list and help him decide where to go from here, please let me know.

Thanks,

Beth in MD (slightly frantic cause he is in the middle of a much anticipated big one)



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
